pr_title: Minor updates to some help pages

timeline.message:
Update Help.shtml

Add info on help documentation formatting for gui command sequences (as per discussion with @dsand47 and PR #8711)
Fix exposed HTML tags in DecoderPro FAQ

Minor update to PanelPro FAQ

Add link to StoringYourWork.  Fix link to be relative address.

timeline.bodyText: If you want the JavaHelp system to index and provide links to these, there's a specific format for anchors needed. It needs to have both "name" and "id".  See https://www.jmri.org/help/en/html/doc/Technical/Help.shtml
timeline.author: bobjacobsen
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -85,38 +81,38 @@
           index each time you update.
         </dd>
 
-        <dt><a name="update" id="update">How can I get

replies.bodyText:
Bob -
Actually, I'm the one who added the text to Help.sthml that says that!  However, when I ran this page through validator.w3c.org under HTML 4.01, it told me that there was no such thing as "name" so I took them out thinking it had something to do with being embedded within the dt tag.
Jerry
replies.author: jerryg2003

replies.bodyText: P.S. and they weren't there in the existing PanelPro FAQ file so I didn't add them.
replies.author: jerryg2003
